Weagle

Features

Staff Location

Get location updates of field force in real-time along with photos and custom messages.

Task Manager

Assign tasks from a web based admin console. Tasks can be updated by the employees on-the-go.

Message

Send custom message or broadcast to group of employees from the web-based admin console.

Check-ins

Employees can checkin at locations that will be updated real-time along with location photos and optional client signature.

Device Control

Control settings of employee devices from the web-based admin console.

Multi-platform Support

Primary apps on Android. All other platforms supported through web-based mobile friendly interface.

About

Weagle is a unique product offering from Wiinnova Software Labs.

An enterprise application to track, communicate, effectively prioritize and manage tasks with employees on the field.

To know more to get a demo, contact us.
